title: Oscar Voter: Meryl Streep Nominated for an Oscar Just Because She Attacked Trump
text:
Prof. Says Trump Will Kill People… Has No Idea Fox News Is Waiting for Him Outside 
That’s actually a pretty apt metaphor for her endeavors in the field of political analysis, although I don’t think that’s what bagged her the nomination. 
In a piece in The Hollywood Reporter , one anonymous Oscar voter says that Streep’s performance was so awful, her Best Actress nomination could only be explained as a liberal reward for her Golden Globes speech . 
“I thought Meryl … played it like a clown — she’s cute and adorable, but this woman didn’t matter to me in the end — but people are gaga over Meryl, and I think she solidified her nomination when she gave that speech at the Golden Globes,” the voter said. “I don’t think she would have gotten nominated without it. Advertisement – story continues below 
It would hardly be a surprise if Hollywood had decided to honor Streep just because of her stance against Donald Trump. After all, we’ve heard over and over again how this year’s Oscars are going to be the most political yet. 
And, you know what? That couldn’t be better news for Donald Trump. No matter what the Hollywood left says, conservatives can be safe in the knowledge most Americans will vehemently disagree. 
Especially if it’s coming from Meryl Streep . Advertisement - story continues below
